msdyn_dataflow.msdyn_mashupdocument: section Section1; shared OpenData = let Source = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://opendata.paris.fr/api/records/1.0/search/?dataset=tous-les-documents-des-bibliotheques-de-pret&q=&facet=langue&facet=editeur&facet=auteur_nom&facet=auteur_secondaire_nom&facet=libelle_v_smart_et_webopac&facet=categorie_statistique_1&facet=categorie_statistique_2&facet=auteur&facet=collectivite_auteur&facet=collectivite_auteur_secondaire_&facet=collectivite_co_auteur_")), #"Converted to table" = Table.FromRecords({Source}), #"Expanded parameters" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Converted to table", "parameters", {"dataset", "timezone", "rows", "start", "format", "facet"}, {"parameters.dataset", "parameters.timezone", "parameters.rows", "parameters.start", "parameters.format", "parameters.facet"}), #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Expanded parameters", {"nhits", "parameters.dataset", "parameters.timezone", "parameters.rows", "parameters.start", "parameters.format", "parameters.facet", "facet_groups"}), #"Expanded records" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Removed columns", "records"), #"Expanded records 1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded records", "records", {"fields"}, {"records.fields"}), #"Expanded records.fields" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded records 1", "records.fields", {"isbn", "categorie_statistique_1", "categorie_statistique_2", "titre", "nombre_de_pret_total", "date", "auteur"}, {"records.fields.isbn", "records.fields.categorie_statistique_1", "records.fields.categorie_statistique_2", "records.fields.titre", "records.fields.nombre_de_pret_total", "records.fields.date", "records.fields.auteur"}), #"Inserted Text Before Delimiter" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(#"Expanded records.fields", "Titre OK", each Text.BeforeDelimiter([records.fields.titre], " |")), {{"Titre OK", type text}}), #"Inserted Text After Delimiter" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted Text Before Delimiter", "Categorie OK", each Text.AfterDelimiter([records.fields.categorie_statistique_1], " ")), {{"Categorie OK", type text}}), #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Inserted Text After Delimiter", {"Titre OK"}, MyDVS, {"pbo_titre"}, "MyDVS", JoinKind.LeftAnti), #"Expanded MyDVS" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "MyDVS", {"pbo_titre"}, {"MyDVS.pbo_titre"}) in #"Expanded MyDVS"; shared MyDVS = let Source = OData.Feed("https://powerworkshop.api.crm4.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2/pbo_livres", null, [Implementation = "2.0"]), #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"pbo_titre"}) in #"Choose columns";
